source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_00<tab>A certain gossipy dwarf has news that might be of interest to you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_00<tab>Le Nain colporteur de rumeurs a l'air inquiet.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_01<tab>According to the gossipy dwarf, Komra has recently been troubled by a number of thefts. The culprit has yet to be identified, and there are fears that the lingering enmity between the dwarven communities could lead the residents of Komra to hold Tomra's people responsible, so <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> must solve the mystery before tensions rise. Why this someone should be you is unclear, but is that not always the way of it?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_01<tab>Décidément très au fait de ce qui se passe en dehors de son village, le Nain colporteur de rumeurs vous a parlé d'une sombre affaire de vols en série qui frappe les Gogg, à Komra. Rendez-vous sur place et parlez au porion nain pour tenter d'en savoir plus.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_02<tab>You speak with the chief of the dig site in Komra, who confirms that both priceless artifacts and excavation tools have gone missing. Alas, he is at a loss for leads, so he suggests that you continue the investigation in his stead. Perhaps there will be some manner of clue that can only be spotted through eyes honed by many years of seeking out random objects at the behest of everyone and their mothers.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_02<tab>Le porion nain vous a confirmé la rumeur, précisant que le coupable était à chercher au sein même des Gogg. Ne souhaitant pas faire de vagues, il vous a chargé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'élucider l'affaire à sa place. Commencez par fouiller la grotte à l'entrée de Komra, où les mineurs ont entreposé leurs chariots de minerai.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_03<tab>Though you are not so fortunate as to catch the culprit in the act, searching the area the chief indicated does reveal one thing that is not like the others─a bejeweled bracelet. Its make and general state of cleanliness suggest that it was not so recently recovered from ruins as its location might lead one to think, but the dig site chief ought to be able to tell you for certain.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_03<tab>En fouillant dans le bric-à-brac des Nains, vous avez découvert un bracelet richement orné qui n'avait a priori rien à faire là. Rapportez-le au porion nain, à Komra.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_04<tab>The chief confirms that the bracelet you picked up does not, in fact, belong at the dig site. He believes that he has previously seen it on a young woman in the village─who is likely visibly distressed by its loss at the moment, and therefore should be easy enough to seek out.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_04<tab>D'après le porion, le bracelet appartiendrait à une jeune demoiselle du village. Il vous a <var 08 E905 ((chargée)) ((chargé)) /var> de le lui rendre, tout en essayant de comprendre comment elle a pu se procurer un bijou aussi luxueux. Trouvez la jeune Naine des Gogg en question.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_05<tab>You speak to the bracelet's owner, who is both relieved to have her accessory returned and more than willing to provide information on its origin. Apparently, it was given to her by the dig site watch, which paints at least a partial picture of how it ended up where it did─or at least enough of one to know that probing further into the particulars would be unwise, lest you be forced to imagine salacious sights that the mind's eye cannot unsee. Unfortunately, she does not know whence the site watch himself purchased the item, or indeed how he managed to afford it to begin with.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_05<tab>La jeune Naine vous a révélé que le bracelet lui avait été offert par un surveillant de mine que vous connaissez bien, celui-là même qui se plaignait plus tôt d'être désargenté<var 1D /var>! Allez demander des ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions à l'intéressé, dans les montagnes des Duergars.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_06<tab>After witnessing yet another argument between the dwarven siblings Anogg and Konogg and the dig site watch over whether the twins might be allowed into the machine graveyard, you inquire as to how he got his hands on the bracelet. Suspiciously, he seems loath to divulge the details─details that an innocent man would surely have no reason not to relate.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le surveillant aux prises avec Anogg et Konogg, qui n'en démordent pas de leur envie d'explorer la grotte mystère... Sitôt que vous avez abordé le sujet du bracelet, votre Nain s'est braqué, signe qu'il y a bien anguille sous roche... Forcez-le à se mettre à table en le <var 1A 02 /var>questionnant<var 1A 01 /var> avec insistance.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_07<tab>The watchman's figurative evasiveness turns literal as he flees the scene. He is pursued by the ever-persistent Anogg and Konogg─who have nothing at all to do with the matter at hand, but are happy to seize any opportunity that might allow them to relieve the man of the key to the ruins.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_07<tab>Ne supportant plus votre indiscrétion, le surveillant vous a faussé compagnie<var 1D /var>! Poursuivez-le sur le plateau aux Rocs, puis parlez à Anogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_08<tab>You follow on the heels of the dwarven siblings, who at last corner the watchman─only to find that the watch<var 1A 02 /var>man<var 1A 01 /var> has in fact been a set of three identical watch<var 1A 02 /var>men<var 1A 01 /var> all this time. This raises several questions, but two of the triplets take up arms before you can ask even one, and if they so desire to do battle, who are you not to oblige?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_08<tab>Alors que les jumeaux et vous pensiez avoir coincé le fuyard, celui-ci vous a tendu un guet-apens avec ses frères<var 1D /var>! Défendez-vous contre vos assaillants.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_09<tab>You defeat two of the brothers that had been masquerading as one man with little effort. They flee once again but, given the beating that you doled out not moments ago, are unlikely to get far enough to cause further trouble. All that remains is to track down the third and ensure that he understands what will happen if he continues to be a belligerent imbecile.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_09<tab>Vous n'avez fait qu'une bouchée de la belliqueuse fratrie. Retrouvez à présent le surveillant, qui entre-temps a pris la poudre d'escampette.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_10<tab>You find the final triplet, and once again press him to confess his crimes. He gives in immediately, divulging the brothers' plan to sell off valuables from the dig site in order to obtain funds for gifts that might be used to woo the lass from the village whom you met earlier. Left with little recourse but to repent lest he suffer the same pummeling as his siblings, he departs to beg the dig site chief's mercy.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_10<tab>Le surveillant a avoué, tout penaud, que ses frères et lui étaient res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles des vols en série. Le mobile du crime<var 1D /var>? L'envie d'impressionner l'élue de son cœur en lui offrant un onéreux cadeau... Après avoir juré qu'on ne l'y prendrait plus, votre coupable est parti s'excuser auprès de son patron, laissant tomber derrière lui un objet. Voyez de quoi il s'agit.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_11<tab>You spy a gleaming object on the ground─the dig site key, presumably dropped by the watchman in his haste to escape punishment at your hands. What you do with the key is up to you, but it would be prudent to at least check in with the chief and see if he's noticed that it's missing before absconding with it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_11<tab>Vous avez ramassé la clef des ruines mécaniques tant convoitée par Anogg et Konogg<var 1D /var>! Mettez-la de côté pour l'instant, et rapportez au porion nain les conclusions de votre enquête.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_12<tab>The chief has not, in fact, noticed that the watch's key has vanished into the aether. He seems quite relieved that the caper has been resolved, so perhaps the lump of iron in your pocket can be considered fair payment for your services.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SEQ_12<tab>L'affaire des vols en série est désormais classée, au grand soulagement du porion. Quant à vous, vous repartez avec une trouvaille fort intéressante...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dig site chief in Komra.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_00<tab>Parler au porion nain, à Komra

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_01<tab>Search for clues.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_01<tab>Fouiller la grotte à l'entrée de Komra

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_02<tab>Show the bejeweled bracelet to the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_02<tab>Montrer le bracelet incrusté de pierreries au porion nain, à Komra

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the bejeweled bracelet to the delicate dwarven damsel.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_03<tab>Remettre le bracelet incrusté de pierreries à la jeune Naine des Gogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the dig site watch.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_04<tab>Parler au surveillant de mine, dans les montagnes des Duergars

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_05<tab>Demonstrate that you /doubt the dig site watch.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_05<tab>/questionner le surveillant de mine

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Anogg, sur le plateau aux Rocs

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_07<tab>Defeat the identical beardrippers.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_07<tab>Vaincre les frères du surveillant de mine

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_08<tab>Search for the dig site watch.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_08<tab>Retrouver le surveillant de mine

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_09<tab>Investigate the metallic glint.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_09<tab>Examiner l'objet abandonné

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_10<tab>Report to the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_10<tab>Parler au porion nain, à Komra

target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TODO_11<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>Hail, sinner! Have you heard about the string of thefts in Komra? Word has it that they haven't the foggiest who's behind them. Not a clue! They've gotten desperate to find the culprit, I'm told, pointing fingers at any who so much as sneeze in a suspicious fashion.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>Psst... Devine quoi<var 1D /var>? Il s'passe encore des trucs pas nets à Komra. Une sombre affaire de vols en série, d'après ce que j'ai compris...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>Why, the next thing you know, they'll be blaming their old rivals in Tomr─ Wicked white! They <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> do that, wouldn't they? Damn those thin-bearded blighters! Listen, sinner, you go and tell them that if they try to pin this on us, there'll be consequences...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>Si ces empaffés de Gogg trouvent pas qui a fait le coup, ils viendront à coup sûr nous casser les c... pieds. Le mieux, c'est encore que <var 1A 02 /var>quelqu'un<var 1A 01 /var> se dévoue pour résoudre cette affaire à leur place. Suis mon regard...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_005<tab>Those bastards! How dare they theoretically accuse us of petty theft!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_005<tab>Si ces empaffés de Gogg trouvent pas qui a fait le coup, ils viendront à coup sûr nous casser les c... pieds. Le mieux, c'est encore que <var 1A 02 /var>quelqu'un<var 1A 01 /var> se dévoue pour résoudre cette affaire à leur place. Suis mon regard...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_050<tab>Yes, yes, lali-bleeding-h─ Oh, it's you. My apologies, sinner. Been under a bit of stress lately and don't really have time to chat. Although...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_050<tab>Tiens, te revoilà, toi. Approche, j'ai une mission secrète à te confier...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_051<tab>Perhaps you can help. I know you welcome these sorts of requests for aid, after all.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_051<tab>En ce moment, on a du matériel qui disparaît, voire des chariots entiers de minerai qui se volatilisent comme par enchantement. Même si j'aimerais me tromper, mon instinct de limier me dit qu'il y a un pourri parmi nous...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_052<tab>Things've been going missing, you see─at first it was just the odd tool here and there, but then the thief began making off with finds from the dig. <var 1A 02 /var>Valuable<var 1A 01 /var> finds. If you've got the time, I could use some help in identifying the culprit.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_052<tab>Mais si je commence à interroger untel ou untel, ça va jaser et on n'en verra pas le bout... Voilà pourquoi il faut que ce soit quelqu'un d'extérieur au clan qui s'y colle.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_053<tab>I don't like to think of it, but it's likely that the thief is one of our own. Hard to access the site otherwise, and I've stalk─er, <var 1A 02 /var>investigated<var 1A 01 /var> most of the unfamiliar faces in town to no avail.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_053<tab>On a déposé tout notre butin d'hier dans la grotte à l'entrée du village. Y a de grandes chances que le voleur essaye de nous le faucher.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_054<tab>I can't very well ask you to stroll up to folks with a, “Lali-ho! Done any crimes lately?” But do have a look around─perhaps you can find a clue that I've overlooked. I'll take anything at this point, frankly.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_054<tab>Je me demande même s'il a pas déjà frappé... Tu voudrais pas aller vérifier que rien n'a bougé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>If you're wondering why I don't simply lie in wait by the valuables, well...let's just say that if there's one thing I've learned these past few days, it's that I'm not the subtlest tack.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>On a déposé tout notre butin d'hier dans la grotte à l'entrée du village. Y a de grandes chances que le voleur essaye de nous le rafler.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_060<tab>I don't intend to let this miscreant run amok, though. I'll be here waiting when you have something to report.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_060<tab>Je me demande même s'il a pas déjà frappé... Tu voudrais pas aller vérifier que tout est en ordre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_100_150<tab>Hmm... You don't look to have our criminal stuffed in your pack there, but I take it you've found some manner of clue?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_100_150<tab>Alors, rien à signaler<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Hein, comment ça, un objet perdu<var 1D /var>? Fais voir.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_150<tab>Hold on, I think I've seen this before! It belongs to a young lady in the village, if I'm not mistaken─though I couldn't say how she came by such a valuable trinket.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_150<tab>Tiens tiens... J'ai déjà vu ce bracelet quelque part. Au poignet d'une jeune donzelle du village, si mes souvenirs sont bons. Par contre, j'avais pas remarqué qu'il était incrusté de pierres précieuses aussi... précieuses.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_151<tab>Seeing as regular folk can hardly fail to notice when something jewel-encrusted goes missing, she'll like as not be wondering where it's gone right about now. You'll probably find her in a panic─all the better for getting her to spill her secrets.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_151<tab>C'est pas le genre de bijoux qu'une jeunette peut s'offrir en théorie... Essaye de tirer ça au clair, quand tu le lui rendras. Sans mettre les pieds dans le plat, bien sûr...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_155<tab>Have a look around the village for any lass who seems out-of-sorts. That's who you'll want to interrogate, mark my words.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_155<tab>Va rendre le bracelet à la demoiselle, et profites-en pour te renseigner sur sa provenance, en toute discrétion.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_100_200<tab>Thrice-damned beardless son of a shite-eating hob... Where, oh where could my bloody bracelet have gone!?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_100_200<tab>Oui<var 1D /var>? Puis-je vous aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_200<tab>You found it? And you're returning it, too? Well, bugger my beard! Thank you ever so much─it was a gift, and I'd hate to have lost it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_200<tab>Oh, mon bracelet, je l'ai cherché partout<var 1D /var>! Ça m'aurait fait mal de le perdre car c'est un cadeau... Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment qu'il y a encore des gens honnêtes en ce bas monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_201<tab>A gift from who, you ask? You probably don't know him─he's a guard over at the dig site.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_201<tab>Qui me l'a offert<var 1D /var>? L'un des surveillants de mine du village...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_202<tab>I had no idea that sort of job pays so well, but it must. When we met, he was a right bastard where money was concerned─I could hardly get him to pay for my ale─but of late he's been downright generous. In a much better mood, too. Oh, and so very affectionate. Mm, yes...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_202<tab>D'ailleurs, je me demande comment il a pu me payer un bijou aussi somptueux, lui qui se plaint sans cesse que son travail ne lui rapporte que des clopinettes...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_203<tab>Focus on the bracelet? If you insist. I don't know where he got it, though─we don't do a lot of talking.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_203<tab>D'où lui est venu ce soudain élan de générosité<var 1D /var>? Ma foi, ce n'est pas à moi qu'il faut poser cette question.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_204<tab>If you're that curious, you'll have to ask him. He keeps watch over the entrance day and night, so he's not a difficult man to find.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_204<tab>Allez donc lui demander directement<var 1D /var>! Il garde les vestiges qui ont été découverts tout récemment.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_205<tab>The dig site watch's name? It's, er...hmm. You know, I never asked!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_YOUNGGIRL03717_000_205<tab>Allez donc lui demander directement<var 1D /var>! Il garde les vestiges qui ont été découverts tout récemment.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_250<tab>Come on! Let us in, let us in!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_250<tab>Laissez-nous passer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_251<tab>Come on! You know you want to!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_251<tab>On veut voir les ruines<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_252<tab>What I <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> is for you two to bugger off. I'm a <var 1A 02 /var>watch<var 1A 01 /var>man, not a <var 1A 02 /var>stand here while everyone annoys the piss out of me<var 1A 01 /var>-man!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_252<tab>V'là qu'ils remettent ça... Bon, ça suffit les morveux, j'ai pas que ça à faire d'écouter vos jérémiades<var 1D /var>! Cette porte restera close, tenez-vous-le pour dit<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, faites-moi le plaisir de dégager<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_253<tab>Don't look now, Anogg, but our <var 1A 02 /var>very dear friend<var 1A 01 /var> is here! And so very heavily armed, too.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_253<tab>(Psst, Anogg... L'<var 08 E905 ((étrangère)) ((étranger)) /var> de l'autre fois est là.)

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_254<tab>I'm sure that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> can help settle this little dispute.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_254<tab>(Je parie qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> est venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> nous aider à obtenir gain de cause. Je ne vois pas ce qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> ferait dans les parages sinon<var 1D /var>!)

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_255<tab>Of all the─ Why are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> here? As if costing me my dinner weren't enough...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_255<tab>Toi<var 1D /var>!? Oh non, tu vas pas t'y mettre aussi<var 1D /var>!? C'est quoi que vous comprenez pas dans l'expression “défense d'entrer”<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_256<tab>How did I afford a jewel-encrusted bracelet on a watchman's salary? That's...that's none of your concern!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_256<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? C-comment tu sais que j'ai offert un bracelet à cette fille<var 1D /var>!? J'ai rien à te dire, et puis mêle-toi de tes oignons, d'abord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_257<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_257<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_Q1_000_000<tab>Que demandez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_A1_000_001<tab>Oh, but I have a feeling that the chief will be quite concerned indeed.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_A1_000_001<tab>Vous avez gagné à la loterie récemment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_A1_000_002<tab>I recall that you have something of a history with ill-gotten gains...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_A1_000_002<tab>Alors, on joue les flambeurs auprès de la gent féminine<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_258<tab>Hmph. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> my words all you like. I won't be intimidated by the likes of you!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_258<tab>C-c'est quoi, un interrogatoire<var 1D /var>!? Fous-moi la paix, ou j'vais me plaindre au porion pour harcèlement moral<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_260<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> my words all you like. I won't be intimidated by the likes of you!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_260<tab>Fous-moi la paix, ou j'vais me plaindre au porion pour harcèlement moral<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_265<tab>Listen here! If you don't let us in, we'll...we'll...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_265<tab>Laissez-nous passer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_270<tab>We'll scream really loudly into your ear! How would you like that, hmm?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_270<tab>On veut voir les ruines<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_275<tab>Crack him like an egg!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_275<tab>C'est bien, bombardez-le de <var 1A 02 /var>questions<var 1A 01 /var> jusqu'à ce qu'il craque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_280<tab>Go for the beard!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_280<tab>Haha, il n'aime pas qu'on le <var 1A 02 /var>questionne<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>! Allez-y, continuez d'appuyer là où ça fait mal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_290<tab>I hope that we're finally close to catching the thief. The machine graveyard is a bothersome enough mystery without all of this nonsense.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_290<tab>Pff... Ras le bol de ces histoires à la mords-moi-le-nœud. Vivement que tu nous chopes le coupable, qu'on puisse reprendre le boulot sereinement.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_300<tab>...This proves nothing, you hear me? Nothiiing!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_300<tab>Argh... Cet irrespect de ma vie privée, c'est in<var 16 /var>sup<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>ble... Je vois qu'une échappatoire possible...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_301<tab>Well, I don't know what you were accusing him of, but I'm absolutely sure he's guilty of it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_301<tab>Ah, il a détalé comme un lapin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_302<tab>More importantly, he's made off with the key! After him!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_302<tab>En emportant la clef des ruines<var 1D /var>! Vite, Anogg, à ses trousses<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_350<tab>We've got you cornered!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_350<tab>(halète) Ça va pas de nous faire courir autant<var 1D /var>!? J'ai failli avoir une crise d'asthme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_351<tab>I don't think he's alone, Sister...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_351<tab>Anogg<var 1D /var>! On a de la compagnie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_352<tab>Oh, dear. A hasty retreat does seem to be in order!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_ANOGG_000_352<tab>Hiiiiih<var 1D /var>! Carapatons-nous, Konogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_353<tab>Just so!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_353<tab>Plutôt deux fois qu'une<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_354<tab>That's right, surprise triplets! What now, baldling!?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_354<tab>C'est <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var> qui m'embête<var 1D /var>! Réglez-lui son compte, mes frères<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_GUARDBROTHERA03717_100_354<tab>At last, revenge!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_GUARDBROTHERA03717_100_354<tab>À nous de jouer, grand frère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_GUARDBROTHERB03717_200_354<tab>In the name of our collective dinner!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_GUARDBROTHERB03717_200_354<tab>Avec moi, petit frère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>This is...<pant>...starting to feel like real work...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>Vous êtes pires que des poux de barbe, vous trois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_360<tab>The jig is up! Now hand over the key!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Donnez-nous la clef et on vous laisse tranquille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_400<tab>Very well, I confess. I did it. Or─<var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> did it. We took turns keeping watch while the others picked over items from the dig site and sold off whatever seemed valuable.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_400<tab>T-t'as gagné, je m'rends... J'avoue, c'est moi qui ai volé le patron.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_401<tab>And we would have gotten away with it, too, if it weren't for those meddling kids. Also you, however old you are.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_401<tab>Avec l'aide de mes frangins, je m'en suis mis plein les fouilles, c'est comme ça que j'ai pu me payer le bracelet. C'était le seul moyen d'attirer l'attention de cette jolie poupée barbue...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_402<tab>I just wanted to impress her... <sigh> But there's no chance of that now. All I can do is grovel before the chief and hope that he doesn't punish me too harshly.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_402<tab>Mais en te voyant leur botter les fesses, j'ai compris que le crime payait pas. C'est décidé, je vais aller m'excuser auprès du patron et prier pour qu'il me vire pas. Merci encore de m'avoir ouvert les yeux.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>You notice that something shiny and metallic has fallen to the ground...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>Le surveillant de mine a laissé tomber quelque chose...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Picking up the glimmering object, you see that it is the very key to the dig site that Anogg and Konogg were so keen to obtain.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Vous ramassez la clef des ruines mécaniques<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_500<tab>That's case closed, then. It's a good job that you showed up─who knows how long this farce would have continued otherwise.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_500<tab>Merci d'avoir fait la lumière sur cette sale histoire. Je t'en dois une belle.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_100_500<tab>As for you... You won't be getting any dinner tonight, that's for certain!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_100_500<tab>Pas de dîner pour toi ce soir, scélérat que tu es<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_200_500<tab>No! Anything but the dinner!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_200_500<tab>Naaoooon<var 1D /var>!!! J'suis maudit...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_501<tab>To think that I was employing three brothers in disguise this entire time... I doubt I'll be changing my vocation to detective any time soon.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_DWARFMASTER03671_000_501<tab>Ce type est vraiment pas croyable... Il aurait pu me dire qu'il avait des frangins à son entretien d'embauche, quand même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_505<tab>We've all taken our lesson to heart. No need to worry about us─or to draw your weapon, thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_505<tab>J'ai fait vœu de probité en repensant à la rouste que t'as flanquée à mes frangins. À compter d'aujourd'hui, je gagnerai ma croûte honnêtement... et tant pis pour la drague.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_510<tab>...Also, our convoluted plan turned out to be just as much work as taking the job seriously, in the end, so there's that.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA001_03717_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_510<tab>Mes rêves, je les réaliserai à la sueur de mon front comme tout Nain qui se respecte. Bien sûr, il faudra aussi que je me fasse un max de blé, car qu'on le veuille ou non, c'est l'argent qui fait tourner le monde<var 1D /var>!
